faqs.question: How does Calmulate help manage stress?
faqs.answer: Calmulate uses data from your calendar and wearables to suggest optimal work times and stress-relief activities.

faqs.question: Can I use Calmulate with my existing calendar?
faqs.answer: Yes, Calmulate is designed to integrate with most calendar applications seamlessly.

faqs.question: What makes Calmulate different from other productivity tools?
faqs.answer: Unlike other tools, Calmulate emphasizes mindfulness and well-being as core components of productivity.
